as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

:hotkey.description: The keys to use as the keyboard shortcut that will move focus to the toast viewport. Use event.code value for each key from keycode.info . For meta keys, use ctrlKey, shiftKey, altKey and/or metaKey.
:hotkey.description_zh: 用作键盘快捷方式的键，用于将焦点移动到 Toast 视口。对 keycode.info 中的每个键使用 event.code 值。对于元键，请使用 ctrlKey、shiftKey、altKey 和/或 metaKey。

label.description: An author-localized label for the toast region to provide context for screen reader users when navigating page landmarks. The available `{hotkey}` placeholder will be replaced for you.
label.description_zh: Toast 区域的作者本地化标签，用于在导航页面地标时为屏幕阅读器用户提供上下文。可用的“{hotkey}”占位符将被替换。
